anya-e0401n0:5_2: Paramatthadīpanīti ettha attho duvidho padhānatthoca pariyāyatthoca.
anya-e0401n0:6_17: Yattha ca mahābodhisattānaṁ buddhabhāvatthāya pathamamahābhinīhārakālādīsu ekappahārenapathavikampanādīnipavattanti.
anya-e0401n0:6_19: Jātikkhettemahāsareyassa ekassa saddhammaraṁsijālino mahāsūrassa udayā tasmiṁ jātikkhette mahāsare janambujāpabujjhiṁsūtiyojanā.
anya-e0401n0:8_0: Evaṁ buddhassapaṇāmaṁ katvā attanā icchitaṁ paṇāmappayojanaṁ pariṇāmento “sañjāta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:9_0: Evaṁ sappayojanaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni sanidānaṁ ganthappaṭiññaṁ karonto “porāṇakehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:10_0: Tattha dvīhi gāthāhi sakāraṇaṁ yācanaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:10_3: Tattha ādigāthāyaṁ “abhidhammatthasaṅgahe porāṇakehi viññūhi vaṇṇitā bahūvaṇṇanā idhalokamhidissantī”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:12_28: So hi ganthārabbhavidhānassa idhaparisamāpanaṁ pariniṭṭhānaṁ ñāpetuṁ ganthārabbhavākyassapariyante yojito.
anya-e0401n0:14_1: Evaṁ ganthārabbhavidhānaṁ katvā idāni ādigāthāya sambandhaṁ dassento “abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:14_19: purisoti vuttegacchati padena vutto yokoci gacchanto vacanatthonāma.
anya-e0401n0:14_20: Purisoti padenadassito padhānattho adhippetattho abhidheyyattho nāmāti.
anya-e0401n0:16_0: Cittaṁ cetasikaṁ rūpaṁ, nibbānamiti sabbathā. ti
anya-e0401n0:17_1: Evaṁ vuttattāyevaca tecattāro abhidhammatthā eva idhapadhānatthabhūtāti ca,
anya-e0401n0:17_2: - padhānatthāeva idhaganthābhidheyya bhāvena adhippetāti caviññāyatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:18_3: Idha ca saṅgahatthā eva abhidheyyabhāvena adhippetāti vuttaṁ abhidheyyo abhidhammattha saṅgahappadenāti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:18_4: Teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṁ pattāpi abhidhammatthā evanāma honti,
anya-e0401n0:18_9: Tadeva idha abhidheyyo nāma siyāti vuttaṁ “saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyo yevā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:18_26: Sā brammaraṭṭhe tiriyapabbatavāsinā therenakataṁ cūḷaṭīkaṁ upādāya mahāṭīkāti pākaṭā.
anya-e0401n0:19_4: Abhidhammatthapadaṁ pana saṅgahaṇakiriyāpakāraṁna vadatīti vuttaṁ “taṁ nasundara”nti.
anya-e0401n0:19_15: Saṅgahaganthonāma pāḷiyaṁtattha tattha vippakiṇṇedhamme ekattha sabhāgarāsikaraṇavasena pavatto gantho.
anya-e0401n0:19_39: Phalānubhavanatthāya tatthatattha phalānubhavanakiccesu payujjīyatīti payojananti pivadanti.
anya-e0401n0:19_44: Yathātaṁ asukasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti vutte taṁ raṭṭhaṁsu bhikkhanti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:19_45: Asukaraṭṭhaṁ subhikkhantivutte tasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti viññāyatīti.
anya-e0401n0:19_46: Payojanaṁ pana abhidhammattha saddena dassetabbaṁ natthi,
anya-e0401n0:19_48: Sāmatthiyadassane pana suṭṭhu paripuṇṇavacanaṁ icchitabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:19_49: Itarathā aniṭṭhatthappasaṅgopi siyāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “taṁ na sundara”nti vatvā “nahī”tiādinā hetuvākyena tadatthaṁ sādheti.
anya-e0401n0:20_1: Evaṁ sappayojane pañcapiṇḍattheti ettha pañcapiṇḍatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṁpañcannaṁ piṇḍatthānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_8: Evaṁ kiccapaccayānaṁ katthaci sakkattha dīpanaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:20_9: Sakavacanaṁ pāḷivacanena sādhetuṁ “yathāhā”ti pucchitvā pāḷigāthaṁ āhari.
anya-e0401n0:20_11: Anantare vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ kathaṁ pāḷiyaṁ āha,
anya-e0401n0:20_13: kathaṁ ṭīkāyaṁ āhāti evaṁ yathārahaṁ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:20_18: Natthi kutoci hetuto bhayaṁ yesaṁ te akuto bhayā.
anya-e0401n0:20_24: Tehi porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu tattha tattha vippakiṇṇepakiṇṇakavinicchayeyuttaṭṭhānesu saṅgahetvā abhinava aṭṭhakathāyo karonti.
anya-e0401n0:20_29: Te antarāya nīvāraṇameva icchantīti kathaṁ viññāyatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:20_30: Tesaṁ vacanena viññāyatīti dassetuṁ saṅgahakāra gāthaṁ āhari.
anya-e0401n0:21_12: Khetta sampattiyā ca ajjhāsaya sampattiyā ca hotīti dassetuṁ “anuttaresū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:21_24: Aññaṁ puññaṁ atikkamanto sayati pavattatīti atissayo.
anya-e0401n0:21_31: kathañca okāsalābhaṁ karotīti āha “sayaṁ payoga sampattibhāveṭhatvā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_32: Tattha payogasampattināma atīta puññakammānaṁ balavataraṁ upatthambhakakammaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_37: Cattāro paccayā ca upaṭṭhākakulāni ca ārakkha devatādayo ca sukhuppatti paccayā.
anya-e0401n0:21_38: Tehi paccayehi pāmojja bahu lassa therassa santāne rattidivaṁ pītipassaddhisukhasamādhīnaṁ pavattiyā ajjhattabhūtā utucittāhārā ca ati paṇītā honti.
anya-e0401n0:21_39: Tehi samuṭṭhitā sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo ca atipaṇītā eva hutvā upabrūhanti.
anya-e0401n0:21_40: Tattha sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo nāma pathavi ādayo vātapittasemhādayoca.
anya-e0401n0:21_53: apuñña kammānīti tānitividhāni akusalakammāni dūrato apanītāneva honti,
anya-e0401n0:21_57: Abhivādetabbānaṁ mātāpitu samaṇabrāhmaṇādīnaṁ abhivādanakammegaruṁkaraṇaṁ abhivādana sīlaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:21_59: Guṇavuddhavayavuddhe apaceti attānaṁ nīcavutti karaṇena pūjetisīlenāti vuddhāpacāyī.
anya-e0401n0:21_64: Laddhaguṇoti ca taṁtaṁpasaṅga visodhanaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā laddhovisuddho attho vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:21_65: Tathā vacana sāmatthiyena laddho atthantaropi ayamidha adhippeto.
anya-e0401n0:21_71: Javanavinicchaye yasmā antarāya nīvāraṇaṁnāma diṭṭhadhamme icchitabbaṁ phalaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:21_72: Diṭṭha dhammo ca pathama javanassa vipākakkhettaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_73: Tasmā upatthambhana kiccaṁ patvāpi pathama javana cetanā eva idhapariyattāti adhippāyena “diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_74: Sā pana pathama javana cetanā upatthambhana kiccaṁ patvāpi sabbadubbalā evasiyā. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:21_76: Sesa cetanāyo eva balavatiyo siyuṁ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:21_84: Itarathā ‘kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo’ti vibhatto siyāti.
anya-e0401n0:21_86: Evaṁ vandanāyapayojanaṁ dīpetvā idāni sesānaṁ piṇḍatthānaṁ payojanaṁ dīpetuṁ “yasmāpanā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:21_89: Imaṁ uggahetvā sudullabhe abhidhammatthe ca anāyāsena jānissāma,
anya-e0401n0:21_90: tammūlakassa ca anupādā parinibbānantassa payojanassabhāgino bhavissāmāti cittuppāda sambhavatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:23_4: Vākyā rambhoti ca mūlavākye yaṁ yaṁ vattabbaṁ avuttaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:23_7: Kathaṁpanaaviparītatthe pavatto sammāsaddo asesa byāpanaṁ dīpetīti pucchāya purimatthame vabyatirekato
anya-e0401n0:23_8: ca anvayato ca puna vitthārento “tathāhī”tiādimāha. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:23_11: “Attano visaye evā”ti attano ñāṇavisaye eva tesaṁ visayocāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:23_12: Yasmā ekopi dhammo kāladesasantānādibhedena ananta bhedo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:23_13: Tasmā padesañāṇikā paccekabuddhādayo ekadhammaṁpi sabbākārato jānituṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n0:23_30: “Sabbaññumahābhavaṅga”nti sabbesaṁsabbaññubuddhānaṁ pacchimabhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavattaṁ aṭṭhasu
anya-e0401n0:23_33: “Niccakālaṁ upaṭṭhahantī”ti sabbakālaṁ upaṭṭhānākāra pattā hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:23_39: Tasmā parittakaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ ekakkhaṇe mahantānaṁ dhammānaṁ napahotīti codakassa adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:24_0: Evaṁ sammāsaddassa atthaṁ vicāretvā idāni saṁsaddassa atthaṁ vicārento “saṁsaddopanā”tiādimāha. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:24_14: atha kho yāvadeva tatīya catutthāruppabhavappaṭilābhāya saṁvattantīti evaṁ ādīnavaṁ disvā chaḍḍitattā.
anya-e0401n0:25_1: “Pubbe ananussutesudhammesū”ti imasmiṁ bhave ito pubbe kassacisantike ananussute sucatussacca dhammesu.
anya-e0401n0:25_4: Tappaccayā tadanantarā evasabbaññutaññāṇaṁ pātubbhavatīti vuttaṁ “tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇātī”ti.
anya-e0401n0:25_5: “Tadanantarā”ti ca arahatta maggavīthiyāca catunnaṁ paccavekkhana vārānañca anantare kāleti attho.
anya-e0401n0:25_14: summavacananti evaṁ anukkamena sattannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ nāmāni āgatānīti.
anya-e0401n0:26_1: “Vasibhāva”nti ettha attano vasaṁ vattetuṁ samatthatā saṅkhātosatti viseso vasonāma.
anya-e0401n0:26_6: Katthaci pana “vasī”ti itthiliṅgapadaṁpi dissati=tatrimā pañcavasiyo āvajjanavasīsamāpajjanavasī=tiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:28_3: “Itikiṁdutīyenā”ti iti tasmā dutīyena atulapadena kiṁ payojanaṁ atthīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:28_11: “Nakevalaṁ vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇameva icchi tabbaṁ hotī”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:28_16: Kathaṁ pana vandanāya paññāpāṭavādi atthosambhavatīti vuttaṁ “anussatiṭṭhānesū”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:28_19: “Tikkhāsūrāhutvāvahatī”ti gambhīresu attha byañjana padesu amandā vissaṭṭhā hutvā vahati.
anya-e0401n0:28_23: Tasmā tāni viggahatthaṁ ajānantānaṁ santike nāma mattāni sampajjantīti vuttaṁ “yathāvutta vacanatthayogepi…pe…
anya-e0401n0:28_26: Māgadhabhāsāhi mūlabhāsāti ca ariyabhāsāti ca māgadhabhāsāti ca pāḷibhāsāti ca dhammaniruttīti ca sabhāvaniruttīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_28: So evasakatthoti ca vacanatthoti ca viggahatthoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_32: Tathāhi anāthapiṇḍikoseṭṭhi rājagahaṁ anupatto buddho loke uppannoti sutvā udānaṁ udānesi=ghosopi kho esodullabho lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ buddho=ti.
anya-e0401n0:28_33: Tasmā buddhoti nāmaṁpi loke mahantaṁ sudullabhaṁguṇapadaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:28_35: “Sabhāvaniruttiṁ ajānantānaṁ pana padasahassaṁ vuccamānaṁpī”ti tiṭṭhatu ekaṁ atulapadaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:28_37: Tādisāhi janā idaṁ loke mahantaṁ guṇapadantipi najānanti.
anya-e0401n0:29_4: Kiñcāpi makkhali pūraṇādayo visuṁvisuṁ - ahaṁ sabbaññū sabbadassāvī - tica,
anya-e0401n0:29_5: ahaṁ sammāsambuddho-tica paṭijānantā yugaggāhino hutvā vicaranti.
anya-e0401n0:29_6: Dhammato pana sineru pabbata rājassa santike sakkhara kathalāniviyasampajjantīti.
anya-e0401n0:29_12: katamaṁ pana tāva acchariyaṁ bhavatīti āha “sampatijātassā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_17: = Uḷāro obhāso pāturahosi atikkammadevānaṁ devānubhāva=ntihi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_18: Tena obhāsena pharitā sabbe pathavi pabbatādayo jātiphalikakkhandhāviya suppasannā honti.
anya-e0401n0:29_23: Evaṁ acchambhi vācaṁ nicchāresi dhammatāya sañcoditattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:29_29: aññaṁ pitato acchariyataraṁ atthīti dassetuṁ “yadāpanā”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_30: Pāramitā guṇehi tena sadiso kocinattheva thapetvā aññe ca mahābodhi satteti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:29_38: Tadeva ca sabbesaṁpi bodhisattānaṁ niyatabyākaraṇappaṭilābhe padhānakāraṇanti dassetuṁ “sāvakabodhisattāpī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_43: Bodhi atthāya paṭipannā sattā bodhisattātipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:29_44: Buddha suññepiloke kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mokkhadhammapariyesino sattāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:29_47: Pathaviyaṁ paṁsucuṇṇāni viya pakatiyā vaputhubhūtājanāti puthujjanā.
anya-e0401n0:29_51: Ayaṁ bhāvoyeva tesaṁ bhūmīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:29_56: bodhisattaniyato ca cūḷasotāpannaniyato ca ariya sotāpannaniyato ca.
anya-e0401n0:29_60: Tesu bodhisattaniyato idha adhippetoti vuttaṁ “ekena pariyāyenā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:29_61: Vattabbamevanatthitesaṁ dvinnaṁ bodhisattānaṁ pārami pavicayaññāṇa sampattiyā vinā niyatabyākaraṇa lābhā saṅkāya eva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:30_11: “Kammasādhanenevā”ti pubbe-tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tuloti evaṁ idhavuttena kamma sādhana vacanattheneva.
anya-e0401n0:30_12: “Tadatthasiddhito”ti tassa vibhāvaniyaṁ vuttassa duvidhassa atthassa siddhito.
anya-e0401n0:30_20: Vatticchaṁ anugato sammuti saṅketavohāra siddhattāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:30_29: tatopi eko akāroti katvā samītatthe dutīyo taddhita akāropi assutoyevanāmahoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_1: Evaṁ dvinnaṁ padānaṁ padattha saṁvaṇṇanaṁ katvā idāni tesaṁyeva atthuddhārasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ karonto “imehi panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:31_5: Tassa pubbabhāge buddhabhāvatthāya anupadadhammavipassanāvasena chattiṁsa koṭi satasahassa saṅkhānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_6: devasikaṁ vaḷañjanakapphalasamāpattīnaṁ pubbabhāga vipassanāñāṇampi mahāvajiraññāṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:31_10: Pajahanti pahātabbedhammeetenātivā pahānanti katvā taṁ aggamaggaññāṇampitaṁ vipassanāñāṇampi pahānanti
anya-e0401n0:31_11: vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena “pahānasampadāyaṁ vā sā saṅgahitā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_17: avītikkamosilantiādīsuviya etthahi pahānasīlaṁ nāma yathā vuttena atthena veramaṇisīlamevāti yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:31_18: Pahānaṁ nāma kocidhammo nahotīti adhippāye pana satipahāna sīsena pahānasādhakaṁ tadevañāṇadvayaṁ upacārenapahānanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_19: Itarathā pahānasampadā nāma asārā aphalāti āpajjeyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:31_20: Paccekabuddha buddhasāvakā kilese pajahantāpi vāsanāya saha appajahanato citta santāne mohavāsanāya vijjamānattā sabbaññu bhāvaṁ nagacchanti.
anya-e0401n0:31_21: Tasmā yathātesaṁ kilesappahānaṁ pahānasampadā nāma nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_36: Idañca visuddhimagge=pahānanti koci dhammonāma natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṁ pāṇātipātādīnaṁ anuppādamattato=ti āgatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_37: Pahāyakadhammasamādānena pana pahātabba dhammānaṁ anuppādo nāma ekopaṇīta dhammohoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_46: Idha pana anuppāda sampāpakaṁ vipassanā ñāṇañca maggaññāṇañca upacārena pahānanti adhippetaṁ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:31_51: “Sīlādiguṇehī”ti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiññāṇadassana guṇehi.
anya-e0401n0:31_53: “Lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitassā”ti dvattiṁsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asīti khuddakalakkhaṇehi ca paṭimaṇḍitassa.
anya-e0401n0:31_58: Aparipāka gatindriyānaṁ sattānaṁ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca ettha vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_62: “Sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhī”ti ettha abhisambodhisaṅkhātaṁ aggamaggaññāṇaṁ gahitaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:33_2: Yathā=sasaṅghaṁlokanāyakaṁ namassissaṁ=ti etthasahasaddassa samavāyatthattā ahaṁlokanāyakañca saṅghañca namassissanti evaṁ samavāyattho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:33_3: Tathā idhapi sammāsambuddhañcasaddhammañca gaṇuttamañca abhivādiyāmīti evaṁ kiriyāsamavāyattho sahasaddena dīpitoti dassetuṁ “dūratohaṁ…pe…
anya-e0401n0:33_6: Ettha ca“samavāyo”ti dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ bahūnaṁ vā atthānaṁ ekasmiṁ dabbevā guṇevākiriyāyavāsamaṁ avecca ayanaṁpavattanaṁ samavāyo.
anya-e0401n0:33_9: - Anekajāti saṁsāraṁ sandhāvissa=ntiādinā atītepikāle anāgatavacanaṁ payujjatīti āha “namassissa”nti namassiṁti.
anya-e0401n0:33_18: Buddhaṁ dhammañca saṅghañcavanditvā-tiādīsu visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā aguṇabhūtāpi dhammasaṅghā idhasamāsapade aññapadatthassaguṇabhūtāhonti.
anya-e0401n0:33_20: “Abhivāditabhāvo”ti vutte tapaccayassa bahulaṁ atītakālavisayattā pubbeganthārambhakāle dhamma saṅghānaṁpi therassa vandanāsiddhi dassitā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:33_21: “Abhivādetabba bhāvo”ti vuttepana tabbapaccayassakālasāmaññavisayattāna tathā dassitā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:33_24: Evaṁ dhammasaṅghānaṁ sabbakālaṁpi abhivādanārahaguṇo eva dassitoti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:33_27: “Attano nidassanenā”ti saputtadāro āgatoti attanā nīharitvā dassitena payogena.
anya-e0401n0:33_30: Ettha ca therassa vandanāvacane thero imehi yevapadehi ratanattayaṁtīhidvāre hivandatīti gahetvā “abhivādiyā”ti
anya-e0401n0:33_32: Appadhāna kiriyāpade pana tadattha nīharaṇaṁ asambhāvento “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:33_33: Tattha “apicā”ti kiñci vattabbaṁ atthīti atthajotane ayaṁ nipātasamudayo.
anya-e0401n0:34_2: dhanavāpuriso-ti ādayo samāsataddhitasaddā yebhūyyena atissayattha dīpakā honti.
anya-e0401n0:34_4: Tasmā idhāpi tathā rūpaṁ atissayatthaṁ dassetuṁ “attanānimmitena…pe…
anya-e0401n0:34_12: Atha kho idaṁpi padaṁ satthu paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇa padamevahotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:35_8: “Nibbānena saheva hutvā”ti ārammaṇādhipatibhūtaṁ ārammaṇū panissayabhūtañca nibbānaṁ attano patiṭṭhaṁ katvāti adhippāyo. Apica,
anya-e0401n0:35_9: samucchedoti ca nissaraṇanti ca atthato samānagatikaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:35_20: Dutīyavikappe akicca paccayabhūtāpi kecikitakapaccayā kammatthegatā kiccapaccayānaṁpi atthaṁ dīpeti. Yathā, diṭṭhaṁ, sutaṁ, mutaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:35_31: Tatīya vikappe “apatamānaṁ vahantī”ti apatamānaṁ katvā vahanti.
anya-e0401n0:35_41: codakopaṭipatti dhammaṁ dasavidha dhammato aññaṁmaññamāno “kasmā”tiādinā codeti.
anya-e0401n0:35_42: So pana paṭipatti dhammo tato aññona hoti,
anya-e0401n0:35_44: “Maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadā hotī”ti yathā ambarukkho ambapupphaambapphalassa patiṭṭhā bhāvena pubbabhāga nissayo hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:35_45: itoyevatassa pupphapphalassa jātattā etthevasaṁ vaḍḍhitattā ca.
anya-e0401n0:35_46: Tathā paṭipatti dhammopi ariyamaggapphalassapatiṭṭhābhāvena pubbabhāgūpanissayappaṭipadāhoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:35_49: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yekeci mebījagāmabhūtagāmāvuḍḍhiṁ viruḷiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:35_51: Evameva kho bhikkhave bhikkhusīlaṁ nissāya sīlepatiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgīkaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento vuḍḍhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesūti.
anya-e0401n0:35_53: dānamayaṁ puññaṁ sīlamayaṁ puññaṁ bhāvanāmayaṁ puññanti vutte dānavatthu pariyesanato paṭṭhāya dānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_54: ārabbhapavattā sabbā pubbabhāga cetanā dānavacane saṅgahitā dānantveva saṅkhyaṁgatā.
anya-e0401n0:35_55: Evaṁ so paṭipatti dhammo ariya maggavacane evasaṅgahito,
anya-e0401n0:35_56: ariyamaggo tveva saṅkhyaṁ gatoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_4: “Puthujjanakalyāṇako”ti ettha tividho kalyāṇako vinayakalyāṇako suttantakalyāṇako abhidhammakalyāṇakoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_5: Tattha vinaye paññattāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato bhikkhu vinayakalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:36_6: So idha bhikkhu pātimokkha saṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāra gocara sampanno,
anya-e0401n0:36_7: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:37_0: Suttantesu vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suttanta kalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:37_1: So catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaṁ duggatibhayaṁ samatikkanto hoti.
anya-e0401n0:37_3: Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti iti piso bhagavā…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_6: Dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_8: Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_10: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hotīti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:37_13: tiādikānaṁ guṇapadānaṁ attha jānanaññāṇena yutto pasādo.
anya-e0401n0:37_21: dhammānu dhammappaṭipattītiādīni bahūni suttantāni idha vattabbāni.
anya-e0401n0:38_0: Abhidhamme vā suttantesu vā vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgatogahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā abhidhammakalyāṇako nāma.
anya-e0401n0:38_1: So idha sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariya dhammassakovido ariyadhammesu vinīto.
anya-e0401n0:38_2: So rūpaṁ attato na samanupassatīti ettha veditabbo. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:38_6: dīsu uggaha paripucchā vinicchayaññāṇa samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suta vā nāmāti aṭṭhakathāsu vutto.
anya-e0401n0:38_7: So eva puthujjana kalyāṇakoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:40_0: Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano. ti
anya-e0401n0:41_1: Aṅguttare pana catukkanipāte katamo puggalo appassuto sutena upapanno hoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_2: Idhekacco dhammaṁ suṇāti ekāyapi cātuppadikāya gāthāya attha maññāya dhamma maññāya dhammā nu dhammappaṭipanno hoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_4: Sutavāti ca sutena upapannoti ca atthato ekanti.
anya-e0401n0:41_7: Puthujjana kalyāṇakena saddhiṁ satta ariyapuggalā sikkhanti.
anya-e0401n0:41_10: Ti saraṇa saraṇaṁ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahitoti vuttaṁ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:41_16: evarūpesu ṭhānesu āgate saṅgha vacane asaṅgahito.
anya-e0401n0:41_17: “Na hitaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchantassasaraṇagamanaṁ sampajjatī”ti idaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gacchāmīti ettha saṅgha
anya-e0401n0:41_20: Sace pana sabbaṁ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṁ anuddhissatameva puggalaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gaccheyya āyasmantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti.
anya-e0401n0:41_22: Atha sabbaṁ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṁ uddissa tassa santike saraṇaṁ gaccheyya saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti.
anya-e0401n0:41_24: Idañca daharakāle sabbappathamaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_25: Idañhi saraṇa gamanaṁ nāma sakiṁ gahetvā ratanattaye saddhaṁ ajahantassa yāvajīvaṁpi na bhijjati.
anya-e0401n0:41_29: Sabbappathamaṁ gahaṇakāle ca aññena dinnattā laddhaṁ nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:41_31: Tasmā aññassa santike aggahetvā sayameva vacībhedaṁ gaṇhantassa gahaṭṭhassa saraṇa gamanaṁ sampajjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:41_34: Tañca kho ubhinnaṁpiṭhānakaraṇa sampattiyā sati evāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_43: Visesato pana vinayappaṭipatti eva idha pariyattāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n0:41_48: “Anekesu suttasahassesū”ti vinayepi bahūni garahasuttapadāni dissanti suttantesupi.
anya-e0401n0:42_1: Kilesesamenti vūpasamentīti santoti vacanatthaṁ sandhāya “samitakilesāna”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:42_13: “Tathā dhārentassā”ti ayaṁ me hitoti dhārentassa hitoyevasampajjati,
anya-e0401n0:43_1: Etena samānadiṭṭhisīlā janā gaṇīyanti etthāti gaṇo.
anya-e0401n0:43_2: Saṁhanīyanti ekatokarīyanti etthāti saṅghoti imamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:43_8: Tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatīti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:43_9: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati visesana para nipāta vasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:43_20: Dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā āyatiṁ vipākapphalappaṭi lābhatthāya dinnaṁ dānakammaṁ dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0401n0:43_22: “Arahatī”ti ca anuttara puññakkhetta visesattādāyakena icchita patthitassa āyatiṁ phalassa suṭṭhusampādanavasena
anya-e0401n0:43_23: dāyakassa ca avirādhanato asaṅkhyeyyāppameyyavaḍḍhi āvahanato ca paṭiggaṇhituṁ arahati.
anya-e0401n0:43_26: Tesaṁ khetta duṭṭhattā dāyakena icchitapatthitaṁ phalaṁ na sampādeti.
anya-e0401n0:43_31: Sayañca taṁdānaṁ paṭiggahaṇato vā paribhogato vā saddhādeyyaṁ vinipātanato vā duggati bhāgino honti.
anya-e0401n0:43_33: “Upasampadākammaṁ sammuti nāmā”ti ekena pariyāyena sammuti kammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:43_35: Ñatti catuttha kammavācā saṅkhātāya pana saṅghasammutiyā siddhattā tena pariyāyena sammuti kammanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n0:43_37: Tathā hi vuttaṁ vinaye bhikkhu vibhaṅge.
anya-e0401n0:43_38: Ñatti catutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahenāti. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:43_39: “ṭhānārahenā”ti upasampanna bhūmisaṅkhātaṁ ṭhānantaraṁ pāpetuṁ arahenāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:43_44: devasaṅghāsamāgatātiādīsu viya bahūnaṁ samūhanaṭṭhena lokasammutiyā siddhosaṅgho sammuti saṅghotipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:43_45: “Ariyapuggalasamūho”ti puthujjanakalyāṇako bhikkhu pubbe vuttanayena sotāpatti maggaṭṭhe saṅgahitoti,
anya-e0401n0:43_47: “Sammuti saṅghe antogadhoyevā”ti etena dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma visuṁ navattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:43_50: Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho tveva vattabbaṁ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:43_52: Idha pana saṅghavacanena āgataṭṭhānassa duvidhattā saṅghassa duvidhatā vuttā.
anya-e0401n0:43_53: Tattha sammuti saṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṁ vinayakammesūti vuttameva.
anya-e0401n0:43_57: Dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṭṭhāne pana puggalikadānesu catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato upāsakopi sāmaṇeropi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:43_66: “Puthujjana saṅgho”ti idaṁ ariya saṅghena vinākevalaṁ puthujjanasaṅghaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:43_67: Ettha ca saṅgha vacanena saṅgha pariyāpanno ekopi bhikkhu gahetabbo.
anya-e0401n0:44_0: Dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasutte saṅghikadāne bhavissanti kho panānanda gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā.
anya-e0401n0:44_2: Tadāpānanda saṅghagataṁ dakkhiṇaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ appameyyanti vadāmīti vuttattā saṅghikaṭṭhānaṁ patvā koci
anya-e0401n0:44_3: bhikkhu dakkhiṇeyya saṅghe asaṅgahitoti natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0401n0:45_0: Khettaṁ dūsentīti khettaduṭṭhāni. Tiṇāni. Khettaduṭṭhā kilesā. Vuttañhidhammapade.
anya-e0401n0:52_0: Idha pana sātissayato khettaduṭṭhe kilese dassetuṁ “sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānusayāna”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:54_3: Vandantohi vandaneyye vuddhe tathā vadāpeti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:54_13: Tathāhi vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti karaṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassana samatthena cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ disvā.
anya-e0401n0:54_14: Porāṇā panāhu cakkhu rūpaṁ na passati,
anya-e0401n0:54_18: Dvārārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭane pana sati cakkhu pasādavatthu kenacittena passati.
anya-e0401n0:54_19: Īdisī panesā kathā dhanunā vijjhatītiādīsu viya sasambhāra kathānāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_20: Tasmā cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ disvāti ayamevettha atthoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_21: Etthahi “kāyenā”ti kāya viññattisaṅkhātaṁ dvāra rūpaṁ karaṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_22: Tasmā cakkhunāti vacane upacāra vacane sati kāyenāti vacanaṁpi upacāra vacananti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:54_23: Tathā cakkhunāti pade cakkhuviññāṇenāti atthe sati kāyenāti padepi kāyakammenāti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:54_30: tīhi kammehi vandāmīti idameva mukhyavacananti siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_31: Sabbamidaṁ indriya saṁvarasīlaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:54_32: Cakkhunāti idaṁ pana mukhya karaṇa vacanameva sambhavati. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:55_1: vācāyavandatī,ti ettha taṁkāyavacīviññatti rūpa dvayaṁ kiñcāpi sahajāta cetanā kammena jātaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:55_3: Evaṁ santepi taṁ rūpa dvayaṁ tassācetanāya kāyavandanākamma,
anya-e0401n0:55_5: Yathātaṁ mātito jāto putto vuddhi patto taṁ taṁ kammesu mātuyā bala vūpanissayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:55_6: Evañca katvā taṁ rūpadvayaṁ abhidhamme dvārarūpanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:55_8: vācāyā,ti idaṁpi mukhya karaṇa vacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:55_10: tassakammassa vandanākiriyāya saha abhedo āpajjatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:55_14: manasāti imasmiṁ sutte yathāhi “cetayitvā”ti purimacetanāhi ceta yitvā.
anya-e0401n0:55_15: “Kammaṁ karotī”ti pacchimaṁ sanniṭṭhāpana cetanā kammaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:57_8: tayomebhikkhave puggalātiādinā paññattivohārena pavattāpi desanā paramattha dhammehi vinā napavattati.
anya-e0401n0:57_19: suddha dhammādhiṭṭhāna desanā pavattivasena visesatā yojetabbā.
anya-e0401n0:57_22: Kasmā devesu eva desentīti āha “na hi manussā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_23: Tattha “na hi manussā paṭiggahetuṁ sakkontī”ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:57_26: “Ekamātikānu bandhā”ti kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammātiādikaṁ ekaṁ abhidhamma mātikaṁ anugatā.
anya-e0401n0:57_31: dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhe nā-ti vatvā tadatthaṁ vitthārento suttañhi patvā pañcakkhandhā ekadeseneva vibhattā,
anya-e0401n0:57_33: Abhidhammaṁ patvā pana nippadesatova vibhattā-ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_35: “Dhammo panā”ti pāḷidvayamāha.“Evaṁ santepī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ evaṁ vicāritepisati.
anya-e0401n0:57_40: Lokasmiṁ kenaci samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyaṁ āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_41: Tathā asakkuṇeyyaṁ desanā vidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:57_42: yo pana bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati,
anya-e0401n0:57_43: pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso-tiādinā nayena pavattaṁ āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_44: Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccānī-tiādikaṁ desanāvidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_45: Tadubhayaṁpi koci bhindituṁ pārājikaṁ vā bhikkhuṁ apārājikaṁ kātuṁ catussaccaṁ vā dhammaṁ asaccaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_46: Atha kho karontoyeva devadattoviya āpāyiko hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_47: Pārājikoca bhikkhu attānaṁ suddhaṁ akaronto apāyagāmīyeva hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_49: Evaṁ kenaci paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā tadubhayaṁpi appaṭivattiyaṁ cakkaṁ nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_50: “Vinayo nāma sāsanassa mūla”nti vinaye ṭhite bhikkhusaṅgho paññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:57_54: Kathañcapariyattisaddhamme paññāyante tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:57_57: Micchāvādinopanavadanti vinaye cūḷavaggebhikkhunikkhandhake sace ānanda mamasāsanemātugāmo pabbajjaṁ nalabheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_59: Idāni mātugāmassa pabbajjā anuññātā gotamiyā punappunaṁ āyācanaṁ upādāya.
anya-e0401n0:57_67: So ca ādīnavo aṭṭhagarudhamme saṇṭhapetvā satthārā eva paṭibāhito.
anya-e0401n0:57_75: Idaṁpi tesaṁ atthañcakāraṇañca adisvā ajānitvā vuttattā micchā vacanamattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_77: “Vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā”ti vassasahassameva saddhammo aparihāyamāno tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_93: Sesāni cattārivassasahassāni anukkamena sesānaṁ catunnaṁ saṅghānaṁ khettāni jātāni.
anya-e0401n0:57_94: Evaṁ tatoparaṁ parihāyamāno gacchatīti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0401n0:57_99: So eva tividhaṁ sāsananti ca vuccati. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:57_103: Bhikkhū ca pariyattikammikā aneka satasahassamattā paññāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_104: Kathañcidaṁ sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ ekadivasaṁpi na tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_105: Te ca bhikkhū sīlappaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitā aneka satasahassamattā etarahi sandhissanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_106: Kathañca paṭipatti sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ na tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0401n0:57_107: Pariyattiyāca paṭipattiyāca tiṭṭhamānāyapaṭivedhasaddhammopi na tiṭṭhatīti na vattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:57_109: So puttadhītu paramparānaṁ atthāya mahantāratananidhayo bhūmiyaṁ bahūsuṭṭhānesu nidahitvā ṭhapitā honti.
anya-e0401n0:57_110: Potthakesu ca tesaṁ pavattiṁ paripuṇṇaṁ likhitvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0401n0:57_111: Tattha nimīsu ca potthakesu ca akkharesu ca dharantesu tenidhayo nassanti antaradhāyantīti na vattabbāyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_115: Yathā ca seṭṭhivaṁsejāto balasampanno puriso potthakaṁ passitvā suṭṭhu khaṇanto tāniratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_116: Evamidhapi balasampanno bhikkhu desanādhammaṁ sutvā suṭṭhu paṭipajjanto tānidhammaratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_119: Sīmānañca pavattivānivatti vā āṇācakkasseva visayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_125: Baddhasīmāyo ca nivattamānā dvīhi kāraṇehi nivattanti antaradhāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_129: Sāsanantaradhānañca nāma anāgate dhātuparinibbānena paricchinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:57_130: Dhātuparinibbānehi jāte sabbaṁ āṇācakkaṁ vigataṁ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:57_132: Dhammacakkaṁ pana devalokesu yāvānāgatabuddhakālāpi pavattissatiyeva āḷavakapucchāgāthāyo viya.
anya-e0401n0:57_133: Apicayo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto.
anya-e0401n0:57_135: Socati piṭakabhūto dhammavinayo satthā etarahi tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ lokassa dīpento pakāsento tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:57_136: Yatobuddhabhāsikānaṁ devamanussānaṁ nānā bāhirakehi janehi asādhāraṇo mahanto ñāṇāloko etarahi vijjotamāno pavattati.
anya-e0401n0:57_137: Tehi sabbaññutaññāṇena desitāni etarahidharamānāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandha sahassāni sutvā anamataggesaṁsāre
anya-e0401n0:57_141: Āyatiñca saggatthāya ca maggaphalanibbānatthāya ca nānāpuññakiriyavatthūni ārabhanti,
anya-e0401n0:57_149: Imāya ca paṭipattiyā āyatiṁ saggamaggaphala nibbānappaṭilābhāya saṁvattanikattāti.
anya-e0401n0:57_150: Ettāvatā sabbaṁ micchāvādīnaṁ micchāvacanaṁ vidhamitaṁviddhaṁsitaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:59_9: Evaṁtīsu atthavikappesu pathamassa kālavirodhaṁ dassetvā idāni dutīya tatīyānaṁ saddatovirodhaṁ vattuṁ “nacā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:59_10: Tattha “ādimhi yevā”ti etena yadākadāci paccāmasanaṁ appadhānanti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:59_11: “Appadhānapadānī”ti abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti imasmiṁ ekasmiṁ samāsapade purimāni visesana padāni.
anya-e0401n0:59_13: tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahappakaraṇe tasmiṁ abhidhammattha padevā sabbathā mayā vuttāti attho hoti.
anya-e0401n0:59_15: Tasmiṁ abhidhamme buddhena bhagavatā sabbathā vuttāti attho yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:59_18: “evañhisatī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ viya idha abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadaṁ paccāmasante sati.
anya-e0401n0:59_21: “Paṭikkhittā hoti” tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā sabbathā vuttāti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:59_22: Na kevalaṁ so eva doso āpajjati.
anya-e0401n0:60_2: Visesanapadaṁ nāma katthaci bhūtakathanatthāyavā payujjati kaṇhokāko,
anya-e0401n0:60_8: Paññāpanañca nāma samaggānaṁ janānaṁ vohārena ca sampaṭicchanena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi sijjhatīti āha “tecamahājanā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_13: Sāhi musāvādādīhi vacīduccaritehi viramaṇamattena vacīsaccanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:60_25: “Evaṁ mahantaṁ sammuti sacca”nti etena ahaṁ paramattha saccamevagaṇhāmīti sammuti saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_30: Bhavanibbattakaṁ kusalākusalakammaṁ nāma natthīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_33: “Vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpetī”ti saññā cittadiṭṭhi vipallāsānaṁ vatthubhāvena gaṇhāpeti.
anya-e0401n0:60_35: “Evaṁ viparītañhi sammutisacca”nti etenasammuti saccamevadaḷhaṁ gahetvā paramattha saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_38: Khandhe vā khandhamuttakevā attajīve gahetvā teca attajīvā parammaraṇā ucchijjantīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_39: Te ca attajīvā bhavābhavesusassatā hutvā bhavatobhavaṁ saṁsaranti sandhāvantīti gaṇhantosassatadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0401n0:60_43: Sabbākārato sukhabhūtattā vedanā sukhāti vuttā nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_53: “Kusalasammatā”ti etena sabhāvasaccepi etevohārā lokasammuti nissitāti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:60_56: Oghehi ca yogehi ca upādānehi ca pattabbabhāvo “oghanīyayoganīya upādānīyatā”.
anya-e0401n0:60_60: Sattasantānapariyāpannā pana rūpārūpadhammā taṇhāpariggaha daḷhaṭṭhena tato bahiddhā attato adhikā attāti atthena ajjhattāti lokasammuti hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_63: iti idaṁ catukkaṁ ariyasaccaṁ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:60_66: Tebhūmaka dhammānaṁ sukhatā nāma calā hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:60_68: Te dhammesukhāti gahetvā attano ajjhattaṅgaṁ karontā acireneva dukkhaṁ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n0:60_69: Te dhamme dukkhāti ñatvā tehivimuttā puna dukkhaṁ pāpuṇantīti natthi.
anya-e0401n0:60_73: “Yo vinā aññāpadesenā”ti ettha aññāpadeso nāma aṭṭhadhamma samodhānaṁ nissāya ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṁ paññāyati,
anya-e0401n0:60_75: taṁ saṇṭhānaṁ attano sabhāvena vinā aññāpadesena siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_83: “Cittenaparikappetvā”ti manoviññāṇa cittena avijjamānaṁ saṇṭhānaṁ vijjamānaṁ katvā.
anya-e0401n0:60_86: “Cittamayocittanimmito”ti supinante diṭṭharūpāni viya cittenapakato cittena nimmito.
anya-e0401n0:60_88: “Santī”ti etena asadhātu vasena atthoti siddhaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_95: imasmiṁ buddhasāsane pañcasāsana kiccāni mahantāni abhiññeyyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhijānanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_100: Tattha sabbepi paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:60_105: Tesu dhammesu tesaṁ kiccānaṁ siddhiyā imasmiṁ sāsane sāsanakiccaṁ siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:60_107: Te ca dhammā eva rūpānaṁ sāsana kiccānaṁ avirādhakattā avisaṁvādakattā uttamaṭṭhena paramatthā nāma hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:61_5: Tattha catusacca dhammā nāma paramattha dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n0:61_6: Pañcañeyyadhammā pana sabba paññattiyā saha sabbaparamattha dhammā.
anya-e0401n0:61_7: Sabbaññubuddhānaṁ catusaccābhi sambodho dhamma paññattiyā saha sijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:61_8: Paccekabuddhānaṁ catusacca sambodho dhammapaññattiyā saha nasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:61_9: Tasmā te sayaṁ paṭividdhaṁ catusacca dhammaṁ nāma paññattiṁ nīharitvā paresaṁ desetuṁ na sakkonti.
anya-e0401n0:61_10: Tesaṁ catusaccasambodho mūgassa supinadassanaṁ viya hotīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:61_11: Tasmā paññattiyā saha pañca ñeyya dhammā eva sabbaññutaññāṇassa gocarāti sakkāvattunti.
anya-e0401n0:63_4: ārammaṇaṁ cintetīti evaṁ ārammaṇabhūtena kammapadena vinā asambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:63_6: tasmā assa nāmaṁ siddhanti daṭṭhabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:63_9: nti ettha ārammaṇassa bhūtasabhāva cintāpi atthi,
anya-e0401n0:63_11: ṇūpaladdhiyevā”ti vuttaṁ. Cittaṁ, mano, mānasaṁ, viññāṇa,
anya-e0401n0:63_16: Evarūpassa ārammaṇa vijānana saṅkhātassa atthantarassabodhakaṁ nahotīti dassetuṁ “santesu cā”tiādivuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_17: “Etenā”ti idaṁ kattuno kiriyāsādhane atissayūpakārakaṁ karaṇa sādhanaṁ vadatīti dassetuṁ “tañhī”tiādivuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_27: “Ekaṁ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhatī”ti idaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁ taṁ kiriyā mattabhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_28: Kiriyāmattabhūtāpi pana te dhammāsayaṁ nānāpaccayā vatthāyaṁ ṭhitā vā honti nānāpaccayuppannāvatthāyaṁ ṭhitā vā.
anya-e0401n0:63_29: Tasmā paramattha padesupi yathārahaṁ tadaññasādhanānaṁ paṭilābho avārito hoti.
anya-e0401n0:63_35: “Abhedassa cintanassabhedakaraṇa”nti idaṁ cintetīti cittantikataṁ kattusādhanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_37: Tassa sarīraṁ nāma visuṁ aṅgaṁ natthi.
anya-e0401n0:63_49: Na pana attādiko kattā nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n0:63_50: Tasmā kiriyā mattameva kattāraṁ katvā “cintetīti citta”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_52: Idaṁ abhedassabheda parikappanāya payojananti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:63_53: “Attappadhāno”ti kiriyāsādhane bahūnaṁkārakānaṁ majjhe sayaṁpadhāno sayaṁjeṭṭhako hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:63_56: Evaṁ cittassa vacanatthaṁ dassetvā idāni tassa abhidhānatthaṁ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:63_57: Yathayidaṁ ye ime tiracchānagatā pāṇā cittāvicittā.
anya-e0401n0:63_58: Evaṁ cittaṁ vicittaṁ yaṁ aññaṁ atthi,
anya-e0401n0:63_61: Etena tato caraṇato cittatoti atthaṁ vadati. Gāthāyaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_65: taṁ kiccaṁ katvā laddho sampattiguṇo ca.
anya-e0401n0:63_68: “Gayhākāro”ti ñāṇena gahetabbo tassa tassa dhammassa dhajabhūto ākāro.
anya-e0401n0:65_14: “Cittakiriyā bhūtā evā”ti ārammaṇaṁ vijānantaṁ cittaṁ phusanākāraṁ janetvāva vijānāti.
anya-e0401n0:65_16: Avasesā pana sabbepi cetasikadhammā phassaṁ paṭicca uppajjanti.
anya-e0401n0:65_17: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa upādāya.
anya-e0401n0:65_20: Evaṁ santepi cittamūlakattā cittanissitattā ca tepidhammā cittakiri yābhūtā eva hontīti.
anya-e0401n0:65_23: Paripuṇṇāni ce tasikaṅgāni upari therena sayameva vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:65_24: Idha pana padatthavibhāvanaṭṭhānattā paripuṇṇehi aṅgehi vibhāvetuṁ vaṭṭatīti āha “taṁ nasundara”nti.
anya-e0401n0:65_28: kusalanti vā akusalanti vā vattabbaṁ natthi.
anya-e0401n0:65_29: Nānācetasike hi yuttattā eva tathā vattabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:67_5: “kenaruppatī”ti ettha “kenā”ti hetu atthevā hetu kattarivā karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:67_7: Ḍaṁsamakasā nāma sūcimukhā khuddakamakkhikāceva mahanta makkhikā ca.
anya-e0401n0:67_17: Idāni pāḷiyā saddhiṁ mukhyaruppanaṁ saṁsandento “samāgamo cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:67_18: Samāgamo ca nāma aññamaññābhighaṭṭanaṁ vuccatīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:67_20: “Mahābhūtānameva vā”ti āpodhātu vajjitānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ mahābhūtānameva vā.
anya-e0401n0:67_22: “Sayaṁpi vikārapattā hontī”ti temahābhūtāsayaṁpi pakatiṁ vijahitvā omattādhimattabhāvaṁ pāpuṇantīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:67_24: Evaṁ pāḷinayena vipattivasena ruppanaṁ vatvā idāni vipatti vā hotu,
anya-e0401n0:67_26: Purimapacchi masantatīnaṁ visadisappavattibhūto vikāropi ekena pariyāyena ruppanaṁnāmāti katvā puna taṁ ruppanaṁ dassento “apicetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:67_27: “Ghaṭṭanavasena ruppana dhammāna mevā”ti āpātāgamanādivasena ruppanadhammehivinā abhighaṭṭanavasenaruppana
anya-e0401n0:67_35: Ekasmiñca sattasantāne ekakkhaṇe eka kalāpova pavattati. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:67_38: Rūpadhammā pana oḷārika sabhāvā ca honti.
anya-e0401n0:68_1: uṇhenapi ruppatītiādinā lokassa paccakkhato pākaṭassa sītādivacanassasāmatthiyena.
anya-e0401n0:68_2: Tañhi vacanaṁ lokassa apākaṭaṁ arūpadhammānaṁ ruppanaṁ idhanādhippetanti dīpetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:68_7: Evaṁ santepi pāḷisādhakaṁ nāma na sakkāsabbattha laddhuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:68_13: “Anuggahānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasenā”ti kiñcāpipāḷiyaṁ sītādivacanaṁ upaghātakānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:68_17: “Pāḷiyaṁ niddiṭṭhānī”ti sañjānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā saññāti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:68_21: vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā viññāṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:70_7: avassaṁ uppajjamānā anāgatadhammā ca anāgate pīḷessanti,
anya-e0401n0:70_11: Visayādhāro nāmamanussābhūmiyaṁ gacchantītiādīsu viya mukhyādhāro nahoti.
anya-e0401n0:70_12: Tena pana vinā aññattha taṁ kiriyaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti.
anya-e0401n0:70_14: Yathā sakuṇānaṁ pakkhana kiriyā nāma ākāsena vinā aññattha nasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:70_15: Tathā vaṭṭadukkhadhammānaṁ nibbuti kiriyāpi nibbānena vinā aññattha nasijjhatīti dassetuṁ “yehite”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:70_21: Tasmā nibbānaṁ tesaṁ nibbuti kiriyāya visayā dhārohotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:70_24: “Taṁ taṁ kilesānaṁ vā”ti te saṁtesaṁkilesānaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n0:70_26: “Punaappaṭisandhikabhāva”nti santānassa puna paṭisandhānābhāvaṁ pāpuṇanti ariyā janā.
anya-e0401n0:70_27: Yathā magge karaṇavacanaṁ dissati addhā imāyapaṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmītiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:70_31: Tasmā nibbāne karaṇa vacanaṁ na dissati,
anya-e0401n0:70_32: karaṇa lakkhaṇasseva abhāvatoti dassetuṁ “na ca nibbāna”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:70_34: Nanu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbāyantīti dissatīti. Saccaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:73_6: “Bhavanikanti nāma hotī”ti bhavasaṅkhātaṁ attano khandhaṁ etaṁ mama,
anya-e0401n0:73_8: esome attāti gaṇhantī taṇhā bhavanikanti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:73_15: “Tīsubhavesu uppannānipī”ti kāmarūpārūpasattasantānesu uppannānipi na tatrapariyā pannāneva honti.
anya-e0401n0:73_20: lokuttara dhammā na hontīti evaṁ vattabbatāpatti dosoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:73_22: Avacarasaddassa uppannatthe gahitepi etedosā nāpajjanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:73_23: loke yebhūyyanayatabbahulanayānaṁpi sabbhāvāti imamatthaṁ vadanto “nanuyebhūyya vuttivasenapī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:73_24: Tattha “kesañcī”ti kesañci puggalānaṁ vā dhammānaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n0:73_25: Yathāmigaluddako gāme carantopi vane caraṇabahulattā vanacarakoti nāmaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_26: Rājahatthī aññattha carantopi saṅgāme caraṇabahulattā saṅgāmāvacaroti nāmaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_30: Ambarukkhabahulattā pana taṁ vanaṁ ambavananti nāmaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n0:73_33: Idha pana bhūmiyo tabbahulanayena kāmarūpārūpa nāmaṁ labhanti,
anya-e0401n0:73_36: te dosānā pajjantīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “tasmā idhapi…pe…
anya-e0401n0:73_42: “Pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya kato”ti tathā pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya gocaravisayattātāyataṇhāya katonāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:73_47: Kāma taṇhāya gocaravisayattā kāmāvacaranti ayamatthopi sijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:74_5: “Avacaratī”ti tattha pariyāpannabhāvena pavattatīti imamatthaṁ vadati “rūpārūpāvacaresupi ayaṁnayo netabbo”ti.
anya-e0401n0:74_11: Arūpassa avacaraṁ arūpāvacaranti imamatthaṁ dīpeti “tesu panā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:74_15: Rūparāgo arūparāgoti pana visuṁ vibhattattā idha kāmasaddena taṁ daññolobho gayhati.
anya-e0401n0:75_1: “Rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhā”ti animittā hutvā niruḷhāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:75_7: “Yaṁ etasmiṁ antare”ti ye etasmiṁ antare khandhadhātu āyatanā.
anya-e0401n0:76_10: Nibbānaṁ pana idha na labbhati cittasaṅgahādhikārattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:78_2: “Sabbahīna”nti lobhādīhi pāpadhammehi yuttattā sabba cittehi hīnataraṁ.
anya-e0401n0:78_7: esome attāti evaṁ pavattassa bhavanikanti javanavīthicittassa vasena.
anya-e0401n0:78_9: kiṁ kāraṇaṁ lobhamūlacittassapathamaṁ vacaneti āha “akusalesu panā”tiādiṁ.“Dvīhivaṭṭamūlehī”ti lobhamohasaṅkhātehi dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi.
anya-e0401n0:79_2: Sumanassabhāvoti vutte kāyikasukhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṁ “mānasika…pe… nāma”nti.
anya-e0401n0:79_5: Kathaṁ pana bhāvo pavattinimittaṁ nāmahotīti āha “bhavanti…pe… katvā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:79_17: Etenāti ca etasmāti ca hetu atthe ubhayavacananti vadanti.
anya-e0401n0:79_20: pakatipaccayena anipphannaṁ kammaṁ attano balena nipphādetīti saṅkhāro.
anya-e0401n0:79_29: “Tasmiṁ tasmiṁ kamme payojetītikatvā idha saṅkhāro nāmā”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:79_34: “Yo pana tenasahito”tiādinā pubbevuttamevatthaṁ pakārantarenapākaṭaṁ kātuṁ “sopana yadā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:79_37: Uppannatthe ikapaccayoti kathaṁ viññāyatīti āha “yasmiṁ samaye”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:80_2: “Na pana te bhedavantā hontī”ti kasmā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:80_12: Te pana bhedā imaṁ cittaṁ bhinnaṁ na karonti.
anya-e0401n0:80_14: Na ca tesaṁ ayaṁ vikappo atthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:81_2: Somanassuppattiyā kāraṇe vutte taṁ sahagata cittuppattiyāpikāraṇaṁ siddhaṁ hotīti katvā tameva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:82_0: “Imesaṁ pana cittānaṁ uppattividhānaṁ visuddhimaggegahetabba”nti visuddhi maggekhandha niddesato gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:82_2: Yadā hinatthikāmesu ādīnavotiādinānayena micchādiṭṭhiṁ purekkhitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāmevā paribhuñjati,
anya-e0401n0:82_3: diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sāratopacceti sabhāva tikkhena anussāhitenacittena.
anya-e0401n0:82_7: Yadā micchā diṭṭhiṁ apurekkhitvā kevalaṁ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṁ vā sevati,
anya-e0401n0:82_9: parabhaṇḍaṁ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena.
anya-e0401n0:82_13: Yadā pana kāmānaṁ vā asampattiṁ āgamma aññesaṁ vā somanassahetūnaṁ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitāhonti,
anya-e0401n0:84_3: Dummanassa bhāvoti vutte kāyikadukkhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṁ “mānasika…pe… nāma”nti.
anya-e0401n0:85_7: Evaṁ sahagatappasaṅgaṁ nivattetvā sampayuttappasaṅgaṁ nivattetuṁ “paṭighaggahaṇaṁpī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:85_9: Ādikappato paṭṭhāya manussānaṁ yathākāma paribhogatthāya lokissariyenathāvaraṭṭhāyinā nimmitattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:85_14: Purimacittassalobhasahagatabhāvo imāniaṭṭhapi lobhasahagatacittānināmāti iminā cūḷanigamane neva siddhoviyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:85_15: Cūḷanigamanena paṭighasampayutta bhāvesiddhe domanassasahagatabhāvopi tenasiddho yevāti katvā “tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:85_17: Imasmiṁ citte issāmacchariyakukkuccānicathinamiddhāni ca aniyatayogīni ca honti yevāpanakāni ca.
anya-e0401n0:85_23: “Yathātaṁ”ti taṁ nidassanaṁ tadudāharaṇaṁ yathā katamanti attho.
anya-e0401n0:85_29: So ātapattaṁ laddhoti vutte sabbaṁ rājasampattiṁ laddhoti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:85_30: Tasmā idaṁ upalakkhaṇa vacanaṁ jātanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:85_32: Pubbe domanassasahagatanti vatvā nigamane paṭighasampayuttacittānīti vuttattā “imassa…pe…
anya-e0401n0:86_3: “Taṁ kutettha labbhā”ti ahaṁ alābhādīhi māsamāgacchīti patthentassapi kutomeetthaloketaṁ patthanā pūraṇaṁ sabbakālaṁ labbhāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:86_5: Imesaṁ uppattividhānaṁ visuddhimagge saṅkhepatova vuttaṁ tassa pāṇāti pātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle pavattiveditabbāti.
anya-e0401n0:88_5: aññathānu khoti evaṁ dvidhā erayati kampatīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:88_8: Idañhi paṭighasampayuttaṁ viya nigamanena siddhaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:88_9: “Idha laddhokāsaṁ hutvā”ti mūlantara virahattā eva idhaladdhokāsaṁ hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:88_18: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ saṅkhāra bhedena avijjāya duvidhabhāvova vutto.
anya-e0401n0:88_20: Avijjā appaṭipatti micchā paṭipattito duvidhā tathā sasaṅkhā rāsaṅkhāratoti vutto.
anya-e0401n0:88_22: Imesaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ uppattividhānaṁ visuddhimaggesaṅkhepatovavuttaṁ tassaasanniṭṭhānavikkhepakālepavatti veditabbāti.
anya-e0401n0:89_9: “Niyāmaṁ okkamantāpī”ti pañcānantariya kammabhāvena niyatamicchādiṭṭhibhāvena ca niyāmaṁ okkamantāpi.
anya-e0401n0:89_16: “Siyu”nti padaṁ dhātupaccayehi siddhaṁ nipphannapadaṁ nāma nahoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:92_10: Ettha ca viññāṇāni ekavatthu nissitāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:92_18: Takkiriyāti ca sukhakiriyā dukkha kiriyāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:92_20: Ca saddo okāsatthoti katvā “dukkaraṁ okāsadāna”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:93_7: Tasmā āloko tesaṁ visayavisayībhāvūpagamane sannissayo hoti.
anya-e0401n0:93_10: Imesaṁ aṅgānaṁ yutti dīpanā uparirūpasaṅgahe āgamissati.
anya-e0401n0:93_12: Tattha “tasmiṁ pana āpātaṁ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ nuppajjatī”ti vacanaṁ asambhāvento “taṁ vinā ālokenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:94_4: Pubbe katakammaṁ idāni nibbattiṁ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:94_7: Idha panasā cetanā samaṅgitāya saṅgahitāti katvā “catasso samaṅgithā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:94_9: “Taṁ taṁ kammāyūhana kāle”ti pāṇāti pātādikassa tabbiramaṇādikassa ca tassa tassa duccaritasucaritakammassa āyūhanakāle.
anya-e0401n0:94_11: “Sabbaso abhāvaṁ patvāna nirujjhatī”ti yathā abyākata dhammānirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṁ patvā nirujjhanti.
anya-e0401n0:94_13: “Sabbākāra paripūra”nti pāṇātipātaṁ karontassa kammānu rūpābahūkāya vacīmano vikārā sandissanti.
anya-e0401n0:95_2: “Khīraṁ vamuccatī”ti yathā khīraṁ nāma imasmiṁ divase muccati.
anya-e0401n0:95_5: Na tathā pāpaṁ kataṁ kammanti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:95_9: “Visuṁ eko paramattha dhammotipi saṅkhyaṁ na gacchatī”ti visuṁ sampayutta dhamma bhāvena saṅkhyaṁ na gacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:95_10: So hi kammapaccayadhammattā paramattha dhammo na hotīti na vattabbo.
anya-e0401n0:96_7: Pakkhantarena sādhāraṇatā nāmapakkhantarassa nānappakārato sajjanameva lagganamevāti vuttaṁ byabhicārassāti pasaṅgassa iccevatthoti.
anya-e0401n0:96_9: Akusalahetūhi ca sahetukatā sambhavo natthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:98_10: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacuticittāni nāma kevalaṁ kammavegukkhittabhāvenasantānepatitamattattā dubbala kiccāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_11: Pañca viññāṇāni ca asārānaṁ abalānaṁ pasādavatthūnaṁ nissāya uppannattā dubbalavatthukāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_12: Sampaṭicchanādīni ca pañcaviññāṇānubandha mattattā dubbala kiccaṭṭhānāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:98_13: Tasmā tāni sabbāni attano ussāhenavinā kevalaṁ vipaccanamattena pavattanti.
anya-e0401n0:98_18: “Ussāharahitāni evā”ti yathā rukkhānaṁ vātapupphāni nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n0:98_20: Tathā tāni ca vipākuppādakataṇhāsineharahitattā ussāhabyāpāra rahitāni eva.
anya-e0401n0:99_2: “Picupiṇḍakānaṁ viyā”ti dvinnaṁ kappāsapicupiṇḍakānaṁ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṁ viya upādārūpānañca aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṁ dubbalamevāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:99_10: Kammānubhāvato ca muñcitvā yathāpurimaṁ vipākasantānaṁ kammānubhāvena pavattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:99_13: “Visadisacittasantāna parāvaṭṭanavasenā”ti purimenavipāka citta santānena visadisaṁ kusalādi javana cittasantānaṁ parato āvaṭṭā pana vasena.
anya-e0401n0:99_18: “Attano pacchā pavattassa cittassa vasenā”ti attano pacchā pavattaṁ cittaṁ paṭicca na vattabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:99_19: “Attano paccayehi eva so sakkā vattu”nti attano paccayesu balavantesu sati,
anya-e0401n0:100_6: “Tānipi hi aparibyattakiccāniyevā”ti ettha āvajjana dvayaṁ javanānaṁ purecārika kiccattā aparibyattakiccaṁ hotu.
anya-e0401n0:100_7: Hasituppādacittaṁ pana javanakiccattā kathaṁ aparibyattakiccaṁ bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n0:100_8: Tampi sabbaññutaññāṇādīnaṁ anucārikamattattā aparibyattakiccaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:100_9: “Aṭṭhamahāvipākesu viya vattabbo”ti mahāvipākānaṁ sasaṅkhārikā saṅkhārikabhāvo purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle
anya-e0401n0:100_10: ārammaṇānaṁ payogena saha vā vinā vā upaṭṭhānaṁ paṭicca vutto,
anya-e0401n0:101_1: “Dubbala kammanibbattesū”ti paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cutikiccāni sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:101_6: Chasuvatthu rūpesu hadayavatthumeva suvaṇṇarajataṁ viya sāravatthu hoti.
anya-e0401n0:101_7: Itarāni phalikāniviya pasādamattattā asārāni hontīti vuttaṁ “cakkhādīsu dubbalavatthūsū”ti.
anya-e0401n0:101_8: Dassanādīni ca kiccāni javana kiccassa purecarattā khuddakiccāni honti.
anya-e0401n0:102_1: Idha dīpaniyaṁ iccevanti padaṁ aṭṭhārasātipadassavisesananti katvā “sabbathāpīti padassa…pe…
anya-e0401n0:102_3: Vibhāvaniyaṁ pana taṁ sabbathāpīti padassa visesananti katvā “sabbathā pītikusalākusalavipākakiriyābhedenā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:104_3: Yathā aṭṭhacittāni lokuttarānīti ca vutte avuttepisijjhanti sesacittāni lokiyānīti ca sauttarānīti cāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:104_5: “Anicchante yevā”ti sacepi avīcinimittassādavatthu viya keci icchantu.
anya-e0401n0:104_7: “Sobhagga pattiyā”ti ettha subhagassa bhāvo sobhagganti viggaho.
anya-e0401n0:105_9: Atha sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ yāthāvato na jānāti,
anya-e0401n0:105_16: tattha taṁ ñāṇameva na hotīti āpajjatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:105_17: Ñāṇena cintessāmīti cintentānaṁpi yattha yattha yāthāvato jānanaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0401n0:105_18: tattha tattha ñāṇa vippayutta cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:105_19: Ñāṇappaṭi rūpakā ca dhammā atthi cittañca vitakko ca,
anya-e0401n0:105_22: Etehi cintentāpi ahaṁ ñāṇena cintemīti maññanti.
anya-e0401n0:105_25: “Abyāpajjalokūpapattitā”ti ettha abyāpajjaloko nāma kāyikadukkha cetasika dukkha rahito uparidevaloko vā brahmaloko vā.
anya-e0401n0:105_28: Abyāpajjalokaṁ upapatti yassa so abyāpajja lokūpapatti.
anya-e0401n0:106_0: Tesaṁ uppatti vidhānaṁ visuddhi magge khandhaniddese evaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:106_1: Yadāhi deyyadhamma paṭiggāhakādi sampattiṁ aññaṁ vā somanassahetuṁ āgamma haṭṭhatuṭṭho atthidinnantiādinayappavattaṁ
anya-e0401n0:106_2: sammādiṭṭhiṁ purekkhitvā asaṁsīdanto anussāhitoparehi dānādīni puññāni karoti,
anya-e0401n0:106_3: tadāssa somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇa sampayuttaṁ cittaṁ asaṅkhāraṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:106_4: Yadā pana vuttanayena haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṁ purekkhitvā amutta cā gatādivasena saṁsīdamāno vā parehi vā ussāhito karoti,
anya-e0401n0:106_6: Imasmiñhi atthe saṅkhāroti etaṁ attano vā paresaṁ vā vasena pavattassa pubbappayogassādhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:106_7: Yadā pana ñāti janassa paṭipatti dassanena jātaparicayābāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassa jātāsahasā kiñci deva hatthagataṁ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
anya-e0401n0:106_9: Yadā pana dethavandathāti ñātīhi ussāhitā evaṁ paṭipajjanti,
anya-e0401n0:106_11: Yadā pana deyyadhamma paṭiggāhakādīnaṁ asampattiṁ aññesaṁ vā somanassahetūnaṁ abhāvaṁ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti.
anya-e0401n0:107_1: Aṭṭhapīti ettha pisaddena imāni cittāni na kevalaṁ aṭṭheva honti.
anya-e0401n0:107_2: Atha kho tato bahūnipi bahutarānipi hontīti imaṁ sampiṇḍanatthaṁ dīpetīti dassetuṁ “tenā”tiādivuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:107_3: Dasasu puññakiriyāvatthūsu diṭṭhuju kammaṁ nāma ñāṇa kiccaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:107_4: Taṁ kathaṁ ñāṇa vippayutta cittehi karontīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n0:107_5: Ñāṇa sampayutta cittehi diṭṭhiṁ ujuṁkarontā tesaṁ antarantarā ñāṇasote patitavasena ñāṇavippayutta cittehipi karontiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:107_22: Tīṇi ca kammāni karontā te heva aṭṭhahi karonti.
anya-e0401n0:107_26: Tasmā puna anukkamena ārammaṇādīhi vaḍḍhanaṁ karoti.
anya-e0401n0:107_30: Tathā ñāṇavippayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṁ saṭṭhi ca hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:107_34: “Nānāvajjanavīthiya”nti ñāṇavippayutta vīthīhi visuṁ bhūtāya āvajjanāya yutta vīthiyaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:108_8: Evaṁ pariyāyattha saṅkhātaṁ abhidhānatthaṁ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgataṁ vacanatthaṁ dasseti kucchitetiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:108_19: Tena sambhūtaṁ sañjātaṁ kosalla sambhūtaṁ tiviggaho.
anya-e0401n0:109_2: “Dubbala kammenā”ti tihetukomakena vā dvihetuka kusala kammena vā.
anya-e0401n0:109_3: “Kehici ācariyehī”ti moravāpi vāsī mahādattattheraṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:110_6: Bhūtakathana visesanaṁ tena nivattetabbassa atthassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:110_8: “Byavacchedakavisesana”nti ahetuka vipākakiriya cittānañca sabbhāvātappasaṅgassa avacchedakaṁ visesanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:110_9: “Yathā sakkhara kathalikaṁpi macchagumbaṁpi tiṭṭhantaṁpi carantaṁpi passatī”ti vacane sakkhara kathalikaṁ tiṭṭhantaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:110_10: macchagumbaṁ tiṭṭhantaṁpi carantaṁpi passatīti evaṁ yathā lābha yojanā hoti.
anya-e0401n0:112_2: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṁ pariyantaṁ karitvā uparito paranimmita vasavattideve anto karitvāti evaṁ pāḷiyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:112_3: niddiṭṭhattā idhakāmasaddena sahokāsākāmabhūmi vuccatīti āha “kāme kāmabhūmiya”nti.
anya-e0401n0:112_5: “Kriyā cā”ti ettha ca saddo pana saddattho.
anya-e0401n0:112_10: Bhavo nāma indriya baddhasantānagato dhamma samūho vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:112_11: Idha pana kāmāvacarā dhammāti pade kāmasaddo.
anya-e0401n0:112_12: So ca pathavi pabbatādīhi saddhiṁ sabbaṁ kāmabhūmiṁ vadatīti vuttaṁ “bhūmipariyāyo cā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:112_13: “Indriyānindriyabaddha dhamma samūho”ti indriyabaddha dhamma samūho sattasantānāgato,
anya-e0401n0:112_14: anindriyabaddha dhamma samūho pathavi pabbatādi gato.
anya-e0401n0:114_4: Pañcannañhi ekato sāmaggiyaṁ satiyeva appanā hoti, no asati.
anya-e0401n0:114_5: Sāmaggiyanti ca suṭṭhu balavatāya samaggabhāveti attho.
anya-e0401n0:114_7: Jhānaṁ duvidhaṁ ārammaṇūpanijjhānañca lakkhaṇū panijjhānañcāti āha “kasiṇādikassā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:114_9: Upanijjhānanti ca kasiṇa nimittādikaṁ ārammaṇaṁ cetasā upagantvānijjhānaṁ olokanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:114_11: Agginā viya kaṭṭhānaṁ kilesānaṁ dayhanatoti attho.
anya-e0401n0:114_12: Ekaggatā eva sātissaya yuttā appanāpattakāleti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:114_13: Pubbabhāge pana pathamajjhāne vitakkassa balavabhāvo icchitabbo.
anya-e0401n0:115_11: Samasaddo pana dhammena samena rajjaṁ kāretītiādīsu viya nāmikasaddoti dvidhā vikappaṁ dassento “sāyeva citta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:115_13: sāyeva cittaṁ-samañca ādhiyatīti samādhīti dvidhā vikappo.
anya-e0401n0:115_19: “Līnuddhaccābhāvā pādanenā”ti līnassa ca uddhaccassa ca abhāvo līnuddhaccābhāvo.
anya-e0401n0:115_24: Iti evaṁ imesu dvīsu atthesu ekaggatā eva sātissayayuttāti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:115_34: “Saṁsappitu”nti evaṁ nu kho aññathānu khoti dvidhā cañcalituṁ.
anya-e0401n0:116_0: Evaṁ upanijjhānatthaṁ dassetvā jhāpanatthaṁ dassento “tesu cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:116_3: Pageva kāyavacīdvāresūti evaṁ sambhāvanattho cettha pisaddo.
anya-e0401n0:116_5: “Jhāpitā nāma hontī”ti jhānaṅga dhammaggīhi daḍḍhānāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:116_6: “Evaṁ santepi tesaṁ samudāye eva jhāna vohāro siddho”ti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:116_7: “Dhamma sāmaggipadhāna”nti jhānaṭṭhāne jhānaṅga dhammānaṁ maggaṭṭhāne maggaṅga dhammānaṁ bodhiṭṭhāne bojjhaṅga dhammānaṁ samaggabhāvappadhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:117_0: Evaṁ saṅgahakārānaṁ matiyā jhānaṁ vatvā idāni aparesānaṁ matiyā taṁ dassetuṁ “apare”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:117_10: Jhānapaccayoti jhānaṅgānijhānasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ jhānapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0401n0:117_11: Maggapaccayoti maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ maggapaccayena paccayoti.
anya-e0401n0:118_10: nīvaraṇānaṁ āsanne ṭhitoti evaṁ vitakke ādīnavaṁ disvā nibbindati.
anya-e0401n0:118_13: Vitakkavirāgo ca so bhāvanā cāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:118_15: Ajjhāsaya balena pādakajjhānasadisaṁ na hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:119_2: “Saṅkhāra bhedo na vutto”ti pathamajjhāna kusala cittaṁ asaṅkhārikamekaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:119_17: Ettha abhiññābhedena saṅkhāra bhedo na vattabbo,
anya-e0401n0:119_18: paṭipadā bhedeneva vattabboti dassetuṁ “khippābhiññajjhānānaṁpī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:119_21: Dandhā asīghā abhiññā yesaṁ tāni dandhābhiññāni. Jhānāni.
anya-e0401n0:119_22: “Yadi eva”nti evaṁ paṭipadā bhedena saṅkhāra bhedo yadi siyāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:119_28: “Satthena hanitvā”ti pare na satthena hananato chindanato.
anya-e0401n0:119_31: Anāgāmino hi suddha vipassanāyānikāpi samānā samādhismiṁ paripūrakārino nāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:119_32: Icchante susati kiñci nimittaṁ ārabbhamanasikāra mattenapi jhānaṁ ijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:119_34: “Rūpībrahmaloke”ti idaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁpi tattha pākatikabhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_35: Arūpī brahmaloke pana ekā eva samāpatti pākatikāsambhavati.
anya-e0401n0:119_36: Upapattisiddhajjhānānaṁ bhavantare sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhāra bhedo vutto,
anya-e0401n0:119_39: Ekasmiṁ bhavesabbappathamaṁ laddhakāle saṅkhāra bhedassa āsannattā vaḷañjanakālepi so eva saṅkhāra bhedo siyāti āsaṅkāsambhavato idaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_40: Tena bhavantare upapatti siddhajjhānānaṁ sannihita paccayabhedena saṅkhārabhede vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:119_41: Idāni tāni magga siddhajjhāna upapatti siddhajjhānāni sannihitapaccayaṁ anapekkhitvā maggakkhaṇa upapattikkhaṇesu
anya-e0401n0:119_42: siddhakāle jhānuppatti paṭipadāya eva sabbaso abhāvaṁ gahetvā aparaṁ vikappaṁ dassetuṁ “jhānuppatti paṭipadā
anya-e0401n0:119_44: Evaṁ mahaggatajhānānaṁ aṭṭhakathāvasena siddhaṁ saṅkhāra bhedaṁ vatvā idāni pāḷivasenāpi so siddho yevāti dassetuṁ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:119_49: kasmā idha saṅkhārabhedo na vuttotiādinā vacanakkamena siddho hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_12: Tattha parikamma pubbābhisaṅkhāro pakati pubbābhisaṅkhāro nāma,
anya-e0401n0:120_19: Jhānāni ca sabbāni uppannāni nāma natthīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_24: imesaṁ sattānaṁ sabbakappesupi kappavināsakāle jhānāni bhāvetvā brahmaloka parāyanatā sabbhāvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:120_26: Dūrabhave pana samathakammesu akatādhikāro nāma koci natthīti.
anya-e0401n0:120_28: Vipākajjhānesu saṅkhāra bhedassa pubba kammavasena vattabbattā “kusala kriyajjhānesū”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:120_29: “Athavātiādiko pacchima vikappo nāma” athavā pubbābhisaṅkhāreneva uppajjamānassa nakadāci asaṅkhārikabhāvo sambhavatīti asaṅkhārikanti ca,
anya-e0401n0:120_30: byabhicārābhāvato sasaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti ayaṁ vikappo.
anya-e0401n0:120_31: Tattha asaṅkhārikanti ca na vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:120_39: Na ca niratthakavacanaṁ paṇḍitā vadanti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:120_41: Sati pana sambhave ca byabhicāre ca,
anya-e0401n0:121_4: pacchādandhaṁ vā khippaṁ vā uppannaṁ jhānaṁ sukhappaṭipadaṁ nāma karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:121_14: Bhikkhu bhāveṭhitānaṁ vinaya paññattiṁ vītikkamitvā akatappaṭikammo vītikkamo paññattivītikkamantarāyiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_16: Ariyapuggalānaṁ jātiādīhi upavaditvā akkositvā akatappaṭikammaṁ akkosanaṁ ariyūpavādantarāyiko nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_17: Idhapi paṭikamme kate antarāyiko na hoti.
anya-e0401n0:121_19: Ime dhammā imasmiṁ bhave jhānamaggānaṁ antarāyaṁ karontīti antarāyikā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_20: Tehi vimutto antarāyika dhamma vimutto nāma.
anya-e0401n0:121_21: “Kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito”ti sīlavisuddhi ādikāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṁ paripūraṇa vasena ṭhito.
anya-e0401n0:121_25: na taṁ apatvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṁ bhavissatīti evaṁ pavattena sammappadhāna vīriyena samannāgato.
anya-e0401n0:121_26: So hi pahito pesito anapekkhito attabhāvo anenāti pahitattoti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:122_6: “Asadisaṁpī”ti tihetukukkaṭṭhaṁpi kammaṁ ahetukavipākaṁpi janetītiādinā asadisaṁpi vipākaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n0:122_7: “Bhavaṅgaṭṭhānesu yevā”ti ettha bhavaṅga saddena paṭisandhiṭṭhāna cutiṭṭhānānipi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n0:122_9: dutīyajjhāna kusalaṁ dutīyajjhāna vipākameva janetītiādinā kusala sadisameva vipākaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n0:122_11: kriyajjhānaṁ nāma hoti” abhedū pacārenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:122_12: Bhedampi abhedaṁ katvā upacāro vohāro abhedū pacāro.
anya-e0401n0:123_3: Atthato pana jhānehi sampayogabhedo jhānabhedoti vutto hotīti āha “jhānehi sampayogabhedenā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:123_7: katvekekantu pañcadhāti vacanaṁ disvā idha jhāna bhedenāti jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedenāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:123_8: Evaṁ santepi idha jhānabhedassa visuṁ adhippetattā “aññohi jhānabhedo”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:125_8: Kasiṇa nimittaṁ ugghāṭetvā laddho ākāso kasiṇugghāṭimākāso,
anya-e0401n0:125_11: “Anantabhāvena pharīyatī”ti caturaṅgulamattopiso ananta nāmaṁ katvā bhāvanāmanasikārena pharīyati.
anya-e0401n0:125_12: “Devānaṁ adhiṭṭhānavatthū”ti mahiddhikānaṁ gāmanagara devānaṁ balippaṭiggahaṇaṭṭhānaṁ vuccati,
anya-e0401n0:125_13: yattha manussā samaye kula devatānaṁ baliṁ abhiharanti.
anya-e0401n0:125_26: “Anantanti bhāvanāya pavattattā”ti idaṁ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṁ anantanti evaṁ pubbabhāga bhāvanāya pavattattā.
anya-e0401n0:125_37: “Desanāsīsamattaṁ”ti rājā āgacchatītiādīsu viya padhāna kathāmattanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:125_39: Kusalabhūtaṁ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṁ puthujjanānañca sekkhānañca kusalabhūtassa dutīyāruppaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:125_41: ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṁ patvā pathamāruppaṁ asamāpajjitvāva dutīyā ruppaṁ uppādeti.
anya-e0401n0:125_42: Tassa kusalabhūtaṁ pathamā ruppaṁ kriyabhūtassa dutīyā ruppassa ārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:125_43: Ekopathamā ruppeṭhatvā arahattaṁ patvā puna tameva pathamā ruppaṁ samāpajjitvā dutīyā ruppaṁ uppādeti.
anya-e0401n0:125_45: Tesaṁ dvinnaṁ kriyabhūtaṁ pathamā ruppaviññāṇaṁ kriyabhūtasseva dutīyāruppassa ārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:127_8: kathaṁ yāva anupādisesa nibbānadhātuyāsavati sandatīti āha “ānubhāvappharaṇavasenā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:127_17: “Na punetī”ti na puna eti nupagacchati ariyasāvako.
anya-e0401n0:127_20: Evaṁ taṁ anivattagamanaṁ pāḷisādhakehi dīpetvā idāni yuttisādhakehi pakāsetuṁ “yathā cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:127_33: “Ādito pajjanaṁ”ti catūsu maggesu ādimhi pathama maggasotassa pajjanaṁ gamanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:127_37: Sabbe bodhipakkhiya dhammā anivatta gatiyā pavattamānā sototi vuccantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:127_39: Uparisambodhi eva parāyanaṁ yesaṁ te uparisambodhi parāyanā.
anya-e0401n0:127_41: Kathaṁ sotāpatti vacanaṁ maggena samānādhikaraṇaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ “pathama magga saṅkhātāya sotāpattiyā”tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:127_43: Mārenta gamanoniruttinayena maggoti sijjhatīti vuttaṁ “kilese mārento gacchatīti maggo”ti.
anya-e0401n0:128_2: “Sakiṁ āgacchatī”ti itogantvā puna idha āgacchatīti attho.
anya-e0401n0:128_14: “Ayañca attho”ti paṭisandhivasena sakiṁ imaṁ lokaṁ āgacchatītiādiko attho.
anya-e0401n0:128_16: Maggasahāyena jhānena vikkhambhitā kilesā maggena samucchinna gatikā honti.
anya-e0401n0:128_24: “Nānatthā sambhavato”ti dvīsu itthattasaddesu ekasmiṁ imaṁ kāmāvacara lokanti ekasmiṁ imaṁ manussa lokanti evaṁ nānatthānaṁ asambhavato.
anya-e0401n0:128_25: Pāḷiyaṁ “sabyā bajjho”ti cetodukkha saṅkhātena cetasikarogā bādhena sahito.
anya-e0401n0:128_29: “Pacchimassa vākyassā”ti āgantvā itthattaṁ sotāpanna sakadāgāmino tena daṭṭhabbāti vākyassa.
anya-e0401n0:128_30: “Dvīsu sakadāgāmīsū”ti āgantvā itthattanti vuttattā tena atthena sakadāgāmināmakesu dvīsu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu.
anya-e0401n0:128_33: Brahmalokeṭhitānaṁ sotāpannānaṁ sattakkhattu parama tādibhāvo natthi viya dutīya phalaṭṭhānaṁ sakadāgāmi bhāvopi natthi.
anya-e0401n0:128_38: heṭṭhato āgantvā uparūpapatti cāti evaṁ heṭṭhūparūpapattivasena.
anya-e0401n0:128_40: “Pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā”ti pañcannaṁ puggalānaṁ idha kāmaloke niṭṭhā anupādisesa nibbānapattīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:128_43: tesaṁ attheso sakadāgāmi puggalo pañcavidhova vutto,
anya-e0401n0:128_48: Tattha “sakiṁ āgamanaṭṭhena āgato yevā”ti sakiṁ āgamanaṭṭhena sakadāgāmīsu āgatoyeva.
anya-e0401n0:128_49: Sabbaññu buddhāpi pathama phalaṭṭha bhūtā sattakkhattu paramatāyaṁ saṇṭhitā viyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:128_52: Sabbaññu buddhāpi dutīya phalaṭṭhabhūtā sakiṁ āgamanappakatiyaṁ saṇṭhitāyeva honti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:128_53: tasmiṁ khaṇe taṁ sabhāvānati vattanatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:128_56: Etena yaṁ vuttaṁ vibhāvaniyaṁ pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamakova idhādhippetoti.
anya-e0401n0:128_58: pañcamako eva idha sakadāgāmipade adhippetesati itare cattāro kattha adhippetā siyunti vattabbattā.
anya-e0401n0:129_2: Orambhāgāya saṁvattantīti orambhāgiyāni kāmarāga byāpāda saṁyojanādīni.
anya-e0401n0:130_12: “Sacca satipaṭṭhāna vibhaṅgesu panā”ti sacca vibhaṅga satipaṭṭhāna vibhaṅgesu pana,
anya-e0401n0:130_13: sabbaṁ citta vaḍḍhanaṁ pāḷi aṭṭhakathāsu desanāvāre vicāretvā veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:132_9: “Aññe cā”ti tehi dasahi saṁyojanehi aññe ahirikānottappādike,
anya-e0401n0:133_9: Anuppādo dhammo sabhāvo yesaṁ te anuppāda dhammā.
anya-e0401n0:134_1: “Ādi anta padesve vā”tiādimhi dvādasā kusalānīti ca,
anya-e0401n0:134_2: ante kriya cittāni vīsatīti ca padesu.
anya-e0401n0:134_8: Magga phala nibbāna saṅkhāto dhamma viseso lokuttarabhūmi nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:134_11: Itarā okāsabhūmi nippariyāya bhūmi na hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:134_13: “Dhammānaṁ taṁ taṁ avatthā visesavaseneva siddhā”ti etena avatthā bhūmi eva padhāna bhūmīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:134_16: Tāsaṁ taṇhānaṁ avisayabhūto saṇha sukhumākāro lokuttaratā nāma.
anya-e0401n0:134_17: Hīnānaṁ akusala kammānaṁ vasena hīnā apāyabhūmiyo.
anya-e0401n0:134_18: Paṇītānaṁ kusala kammānaṁ vasena paṇītā sugati bhūmiyo.
anya-e0401n0:134_19: Tattha ca nānā akusala kammānaṁ vā nānā kusala kammānaṁ vā oḷārika sukhumatā vasena nānā duggati bhūmiyo
anya-e0401n0:134_20: nānā sugati bhūmiyo ca siddhā hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “api cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:135_7: Iminā vacanena sakalampi gāthaṁ ekūna navutippabhedaṁ mānasaṁ ekavīsa sataṁ katvā vibhajantī-ti evaṁ ekavākyaṁ katvā yojanaṁ ñāpeti.
anya-e0401n0:135_17: “Evaṁ vutta”nti vibhāvaniyaṁ jhānaṅgavasena pathamajjhāna sadisattā pathamajjhānañcāti evaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:135_19: Na itarāni lokiyajjhānāni sātissayato jhānāni nāma siyuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:135_29: Yathālokiyajjhānesu upacārabhūtā bhāvanā kāci vitakka virāga bhāvanā nāma hoti…pe…
anya-e0401n0:135_31: Asaññi gāmīnaṁ pana saññā virāga bhāvanā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:135_33: “Sā”ti upacāra bhāvanā.“Upekkhā sahagataṁ vā”ti ettha vā saddena rūpasamatikkamaṁ vā saññā samatikkamaṁ vāti avuttaṁ vikappeti.
anya-e0401n0:135_39: Attano jhānaṁ avitakkaṁ kātunti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:136_2: “Vipassanā pākatikā evā”tikāci virāga bhāvanā nāma na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:136_10: Yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpatti dhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito hoti.
anya-e0401n0:136_13: Ettha hi “yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāyā”ti etena pādakajjhānaṁ kathitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:136_14: “Pādakajjhāne satī”ti etena ayaṁ vādopi pādakajjhānena vinā nasijjhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:136_16: pattā hotī”ti etena imasmiṁ vādepi vipassanā niyāmo icchitabboti dasseti.
anya-e0401n0:136_20: Pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya hi pathamajjhānādīni sammasato uppannamaggo pathamattheravādena pañcamajjhāniko,
anya-e0401n0:136_21: dutīya vādena pathamādijjhāniko āpajjatīti dvepi vādā virujjhanti.
anya-e0401n0:136_23: taṁ jhāniko hotīti te ca vādā na virujjhanti,
anya-e0401n0:136_24: ajjhāsayo ca sātthako hotīti evaṁ aviruddho vutto hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:136_31: Pāḷiyaṁ “ajjhattaṁ suññataṁ manasi karotī”ti ajjhattasantānetaṁ taṁ jhānañca jhānasahagatañca khandha
anya-e0401n0:136_32: pañcakaṁ nicca sukha atta jīvato suññataṁ manasi karoti.
anya-e0401n0:137_2: Upacāra bhāvanā eva uparijjhāne jhānaṅgaṁ niyāmetīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:137_3: Heṭṭhā pana ajjhāsayo eva uparijjhāne jhānaṅgaṁ niyāmetīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:137_4: Tattha “ajjhāsayo evā”ti eva saddena pādakajjhānaṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0401n0:137_5: “Idha upacāra bhāvanā evā”ti eva saddena ajjhāsayaṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0401n0:137_6: Etesu hi dvīsu saha bhāvīsu upacāra bhāvanā eva padhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:137_7: Ajjhāsayo pana tassa nānā sattiyogaṁ sādheti.
anya-e0401n0:137_8: “Ajjhāsaya sāmaññaṁ saṇṭhātī”ti magge yaṁ laddhabbaṁ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:137_10: mayhaṁ viseso natthīti evaṁ ajjhāsaya sāmaññaṁ saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0401n0:137_15: “Sabbajjhānesu ciṇṇavasibhūtānaṁ”ti idaṁ samāpajjananti ca nibbattananti ca pada dvaye sambandha vacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:137_16: “Vipassanā visesatthāya evā”ti vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā visesatthāya eva.
anya-e0401n0:137_17: Yasmā pana aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ekekāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vuṭṭhita samāpatti dhamma sammasanaṁ āgataṁ,
anya-e0401n0:137_27: “Tattha ṭhito”ti tasmiṁ pathamajjhāne aparihīno hutvā ṭhito.
anya-e0401n0:137_33: “Pīti sukhaṁ”ti pītiyā ca sukhena ca sampannaṁ. Athavā,
anya-e0401n0:137_34: vivekehi jātāni pīti sukhāni assāti vivekajaṁ pīti sukhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:137_42: “Tattha parinibbāyī”ti brahmaloke avassaṁ parinibbāya na dhammo.
anya-e0401n0:138_4: tato paraṁ pavattaṁ cittasantānaṁ vitakke ninnaṁ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:138_7: Tato paraṁ pavattaṁ cittasantānaṁ vicāre ninnaṁ hoti,
anya-e0401n0:139_4: Pādakajjhānādīnaṁ vasena siddhoti gahite satīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_5: “Yāya kāya ci vedanāya yuttā hutvā”ti somanassa vedanāya vāyuttā hutvā upekkhā vedanāya vā yuttā hutvā.
anya-e0401n0:139_6: “Tehi niyamitāya ekekāya magga vedanāyā”ti pādakajjhānādīhi niyamitāya magge somanassa vedanāya eva vāsaddhiṁ
anya-e0401n0:139_7: ghaṭiyeyya magge upekkhā vedanāya eva vāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:139_9: Tasmā maggejhānaṅga niyame siddhe magge vedanā niyamopi siddho.
anya-e0401n0:139_10: Tāni pana pādakajjhānādīni majjhe vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyaṁ nakiñciniyāmenti.
anya-e0401n0:139_12: pādakajjhānādīhi niyamitāya magge ekekāya vedanāya saddhiṁ dve dve vipassanā vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:139_13: Magge somanassa vedanāya vā saddhiṁ dve vipassanā vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:139_14: Magge upekkhā vedanāya vā saddhiṁ dve vipassanā vedanāyo ghaṭiyeyyuṁti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_15: Evañcasati ekavīthiyaṁ javanāni bhinna vedanāni siyuṁ.
anya-e0401n0:139_17: Tasmā magge vedanā niyamo pādakajjhānādi niyamena siddho na hoti,
anya-e0401n0:139_19: Tāni pana pādakajjhānādīni majjhe vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyaṁ na kiñci na niyāmenti.
anya-e0401n0:139_20: Vedanaṁ niyāmenti yevāti dassetuṁ “taṁpi na yujjatī”ti vatvā “pādakajjhānādīnaṁ vasenevā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:139_21: “Cha nekkhammassitā upekkhā”ti ekāva catutthajjhānu pekkhā chasu ārammaṇesu somanassāni pajahitvā pavattattā cha nekkhammassitā upekkhā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_22: “Cha nekkhammassitāni somanassānī”ti ekaṁ vapathamajjhāna somanassaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu cha gehassitāni
anya-e0401n0:139_23: pajahitvā pavattattā cha nekkhammassitāni somanassāni nāma honti.
anya-e0401n0:139_25: “Pathamādīni ca tīṇi jhānānī”ti catukkanaye tīṇi somanassa jhānāni pādakāni katvā.
anya-e0401n0:139_26: “Suddhasaṅkhāre ca pādakekatvā”ti ārammaṇa bhāvena pādakekatvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:139_27: Ayañca pādakajjhānādīnaṁ vasena vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāyañca magge ca vedanā pariṇāmo aṭṭhasāliniyaṁpi vitthārato vutto.
anya-e0401n0:139_28: “Amānusī ratī hotī”ti manussānaṁ gehassitaratiṁ atikkamma ṭhitattā amānusī nāma rati hoti.
anya-e0401n0:139_29: “Sammadhammaṁ vipassato”ti sammā anicca lakkhaṇa dhammaṁ passantassa bhikkhunoti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:140_4: Idha citta bhedassa adhippetattā jhānabhedeti ca jhānanti ca vuttepi cittameva adhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:141_1: “Aparāpi yojanā vuttā”ti athavā rūpāvacaraṁ cittaṁ anuttarañca pathamādijjhāna bhedena yathā gayhati,
anya-e0401n0:141_2: tathā āruppañcāpi pañcamejhāne gayhatīti evaṁ aparāpi yojanā vuttā.
anya-e0401n0:141_8: “Āhā”ti ca “āhū”ti ca vattamānakālepi icchanti saddavidūti vuttaṁ “kathenti vā”ti.
anya-e0401n0:141_10: vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā”ti gāthāya nigamananti ñāpanatthaṁ “vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā”ti vuttaṁ hotī”ti vuttaṁ.
